page.title: 08Worries
page.content: We asked people what they thought about most or worried about. Some people were worried about the starving people in Africa and the huge amounts of food in Europe.They thought it was wrong for one part of the world to have too much food whilst other people were dying. Some people mentioned the high rate of unemployment in this country and worried that their children might not be able to get jobs. Some people were keen conservationists and wanted to keep the country and the world free from pollution. We think that the people in this part of the country are very much the same as anywhere else in this respect. This is probably because we all see the same programmes and read the same newspapers.
